findings.title: Some functions lack the check of paused status
findings.description: The contract will be paused when something emergent is happening. In this case, functions that can move user’s tokens/rewards should not function. However, we find `withdraw`, `redeposit` and `claimRewards` do not check the paused status.

findings.title: Ensure the security of the private key of the owner
findings.description: Since the contract owner can set various kinds of important parameters (e.g., the reward-Time), it is critical to ensure the security of the owner’s private key. For instance, the multisig wallet can be used for the owner, and the hardware-based private key protection schema (e.g., TEE based solution) can be leveraged.

findings.title: Use memory instead of storage to save gas
findings.description: Using memory instead of storage can help optimize gas usage.
